items.text:
5:00 AM

Start from Sun City Apartments, Bangalore.

5:00 AM - 8:30 AM

Drive to Hogenakkal Falls (Approx. 3.5 hours). View driving directions

9:00 AM - 2:00 PM

Explore Hogenakkal Falls. Enjoy a coracle ride (check availability and safety), see the waterfalls, and have lunch at a local restaurant.

4:00 PM

Check into The Royal Honeychilk Palace. View on map. View driving directions

Evening

Relax at the hotel and have dinner.

Morning

Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. You can explore the nearby village or take a short walk.

11:00 AM

Check out from the hotel and start your drive back to Bangalore. View driving directions

On the way

You can stop for lunch at a restaurant on the highway.

5:00 PM

Arrive at Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.
